I implore @POTUS to immediately impose sweeping secondary sanctions against Russia‚Äôs entire financial sector and for Congress to pass the Never Yielding Europe's Territory Act to impose such sanctions‚Äîbefore more blood is shed.

While coordinating with our European allies is important, we can no longer wait on reaching a consensus with the EU before taking swift and severe action. America must step up and lead before Russian aggression escalates even further.
